original_text: Then the king's officers, his wise men and the government rulers and leaders came near to the three men. They saw that the fire had not hurt Shadrach, Meshach or Abednego. The fire had not even burnt their hair or their clothes. They did not even have any smell from the fire.
korean_text: 총독과 지사와 행정관과 왕의 모사들이 모여 이 사람들을 본즉 불이 능히 그들의 몸을 해하지 못하였고 머리털도 그을리지 아니하였고 겉옷 빛도 변하지 아니하였고 불 탄 냄새도 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Then the king's officers came near
and the government rulers and leaders came near
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 정부 통치자들과 지도자들이 가까이 왔다

sentences.original_text: They saw that the fire had not hurt Shadrach
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 불이 사드락을 해치지 않았음을 보았다

sentences.original_text: the fire had not hurt Meshach
The fire had not even burnt their hair
sentences.korean_translation: 불은 심지어 그들의 머리카락도 태우지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They did not even have any smell from the fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 불에서 온 어떤 냄새도 심지어 가지고 있지 않았다
